title: Field Remedy: 2366
subject:
Engine Z22SE/Z22YH, tensioner timing chain
- Rattling noise from timing chain
complaint:
Rattling noise from timing chain, often
together with elongated timing chain.
production:
A modified Z20NET tensioner will be
introduced in production with MY 2009.

remedyContent.text:
Note: For Z22SE engines please first take note of Quick 
Information 1532.

In case of customer complaint exchange timing chain 
(including the improved tensioner).

Improved timing chain kits for engine Z22YH/Z22SE available
via P&A under partnumber / cataloguenumber:

-->
 Kit timing chain for engine Z22YH partnumber: 55569838 /
    cataloguenumber: 6 36 176

-->
 Kit timing chain for engine Z22SE partnumber: 55570337 / 
    cataloguenumber: 6 36 177
